vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Ephraim living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.7.25;
son of: Beriah (H1283H);
brother of: Sheerah (H7609) and Rephah (H7506);
father of: Telah (H8520)
§ Resheph = "flame"
a son of Ephraim
vocabInfos._es_Definition: (1)   llama, chispa; (2)   pestilencia; (3)   hijo de Réfah; ancestro de Josué; tribu de Efraín
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
利悉 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "火焰"
以法蓮的後裔 (代上 7:25)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
利悉 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "火焰"
以法莲的后裔 (代上 7:25)
